snippet: A House bill would allow banks to be reorganized without hurting the economy, but it has several features that could make bailouts more likely....

byline.original: By MARK J. ROE and DAVID A. SKEEL Jr

lead_paragraph: A House bill would allow banks to be reorganized without hurting the economy, but it has several features that could make bailouts more likely.

headline.main: Bankruptcy for Banks: A Sound Concept That Needs Fine-Tuning
